290405.「立派に 村を復興されたこと\n 私も うれしく 思っています。:
I'm so happy to see that you've restored
your village.

290406.「ふたり分の人生を 背負い\n その重圧に 負けることなく\n 歩みを止めずにい:
I admire you for carrying the weight of two
lives on your shoulders and not letting it
stop you from moving forward.

290407.「この世に 生を取りもどしたあと\n 多くの人々を 救っていく様子は\n 目が:
It was fascinating to watch you save so many
people after you came back to this world.

290408.「あなたが 無事 冥獣王を打ち破り\n アストルティアを救ってくれたこと\n 誇:
I am proud of you for successfully defeating
the Beast Lord and saving Astoltia.

290409.「勇者と盟友。その関係は この先の世代でも\n くり返されるのでしょうか。:
Hero and allies. Will this relationship be
repeated in future generations?

290410.「物語の中の人物を 再現してしまうなど\n 大魔王マデサゴーラは いったい何を\:
What in the world was Madesagora
thinking when he re-created the
characters in that story?

290411.「あなたの行動のおかげで 遺された人たちは\n 亡くなった子どもたちと 再会を果:
Thanks to your actions, the survivors have
been reunited with their deceased children and
the emotional scars seem to be fading.

290412.「人となった魔物が 何を考えて\n どのような 気持ちでいるのか\n 一度 会っ:
I would like to meet and talk with them once
to find out what they are thinking and
feeling.

290413.「大魔王マデサゴーラを討ち倒し\n アストルティアに 平和をもたらしてくれたこと:
We are very grateful to you for defeating
Madesagora and bringing peace to Astoltia.

290414.「王族が集い 盛大な舞踏会も 催されましたが\n 大きな事件も 起こってしまいま:
There was a royal gathering and a grand ball,
but there was also a major incident. It is
painful to think of your feelings.

292914.「ナドラガ教団の大神殿は 荘厳ですね。\n <pc>が成した 五つの領界をつなげ:
The Great Temple of the Nadraga Order is majestic. I am also proud of the achievement of in connecting the five
realms.

292915.「多くの者との 再会の喜びと\n あなたが生命を落とした 悲しみと……\n この:
I have mixed feelings about this town, the joy
of reuniting with so many and the sadness of
your loss of life.

292916.「あなたが 邪竜神ナドラガを打ち倒し\n アストルティアも ナドラガンドも\n:
We thank you for defeating Nadraga, the
Wicked and saving both Astoltia and Nadragand.

292917.「<pc>が 生まれた家を見られたことを\n うれしく思います。都合が良ければ\:
Glad to have seen the house where
<pc> was born. I would love to visit
again if it is convenient!

292918.「勇者アルヴァンに協力し 不死の魔王ネロドスを\n 討伐してくれたことに 感謝い:
We thank Hero Alvan for his help in defeating
Immortal Demon King Nerodos.

292919.「あやつられていたとはいえ 父親と\n <pc>が 剣を交えてしまったこと\n:
It pains me that my father and <pc>
crossed swords, even though he was being
manipulated.

292920.「永久時環は 荘厳でしたね。\n ただ本来ならば 消え去っていたエテーネ王国が\:
The Eternal Ring was majestic. I am still
amazed that the Ethene Kingdom, which had
originally disappeared, is still here today.

292921.「魔王ユシュカとの 血の契約の代償で\n <pc>が 魔族になるとは驚きましたが:
I was surprised that would become a demon at the cost of a blood contract with Demon King Yushka, but I am relieved that
he survived.

292922.「魔界には一度 行ってみたかったのです。\n <pc>の 立派なお城も見られまし:
I had always wanted to visit Demon World.
Thank you for taking me to see the magnificent
castle of <pc>.

292923.「アストルティアと魔界の者たちが協力し\n 邪神に立ち向かう。その架け橋となった:
Astoltia and those of the Demon World joined forces to fight the evil gods. I am proud of for being the bridge between
the two.

294233.まだ その思い出の場所には 行けないようだ。: You can't go to that Memory Spot yet.

304551.「ルティアナ様が 失われたことは悲しいですが\n 絶対滅神ジャゴヌバを滅ぼし ア:
We are saddened by the loss of Master Lutiana,
but we cannot thank him enough for destroying
Jagonuba and saving Astoltia.
